name: Conspiracy Theorist Simulator
description:
DON'T PLAY IN FULL SCREEN, IT WILL GLITCH THE GAME OUT

Play as a conspiracy theorist, and identify the reptilians among your neighbours!

We changed ideas mid-jam, so it was only made in 1.5 days, so it lacks a bit of polish ^^'

We're open to feedback, so feel free to comment!

Credits

Game Design : Caberu and Gogani

Art : Caberu

Programming : Caberu and Gogani

Music : Hivernote
